All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Uchigatana
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem

A katana that can be used to attack the enemy. It deals 115 damage with 80% hit rate Created by:
Author:
Salar Ghadrigolestani Modified by:
